channel.title: How to add things on the Harp
channel.description:
Hello evrybody know about the Harp with music?
i saw one server (CheatScape) there they had added like this:
[ul][li]Spawn bank (admin)[/li][li]Teleport[/li][/ul] and more... how is it possible?
when we cick ect the x in front of teleport it come a list of teleports and when we click they we teleport to there.
please help me. Happy for answers and sorry for bad spelling
-Meele

item.title: How to add things on the Harp
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:4, topic:286275”]Well, you’ll need to add things to your texthandler, first…

c.sendQuest("TEXT HERE", ####);

Now, to make when you click on it do things…You’ll have to add stuff to your clickingMost class or your client class, if you do not have a clickingMost class, then add this under case 185 (action buttons):

case ####: teleportToX = ####; //or whatever teleport method your server uses. teleportToY = ####; break;

Just a basic rundown, I don’t know the sendquests or button ID’s for the music tab…Sorry.[/quote]
thank you!
somone know the id for harp tabs?

Read full topic
item.source: How to add things on the Harp

item.title: How to add things on the Harp
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Well, you’ll need to add things to your texthandler, first…

c.sendQuest("TEXT HERE", ####);

Now, to make when you click on it do things…You’ll have to add stuff to your clickingMost class or your client class, if you do not have a clickingMost class, then add this under case 185 (action buttons):

case ####: teleportToX = ####; //or whatever teleport method your server uses. teleportToY = ####; break;

Just a basic rundown, I don’t know the sendquests or button ID’s for the music tab…Sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add things on the Harp

item.title: How to add things on the Harp
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:2, topic:286275”][quote author=bobbie1990 link=topic=378612.msg2847722#msg2847722 date=1246376197]
Hello evrybody know about the Harp with music?

i saw one server (CheatScape) there they had added like this:

[ul][li]Spawn bank (admin)[/li][li]Teleport[/li][/ul]
and more… how is it possible?

when we cick ect the x in front of teleport it come a list of teleports and when we click they we teleport to there.

please help me.
Happy for answers and sorry for bad spelling

-Meele
[/quote]

You mean like…Adding things to the music tab that, when you click them, will teleport you places…Spawn stuff…Etc?[/quote]

yes

Read full topic
